short_summary: Provide DND, Royal Canadian Dragoons, w/ a CNC Plasma Cutting Table system at Garrison Petawawa, Petawawa, ON - Competitive - Open bidding
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 07 February 2022. at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Le Canada cherche \\
